title.heading: YOU CAN RECEIVE CHRIST RIGHT NOW BY FAITH THROUGH PRAYER

page.text: God knows your heart and is not as concerned with your words as He is with the attitude of your heart.

button.buttontext: The following is a suggested prayer:

panel.text:
Lord Jesus,
I want to know you personally. Thank you for dying on the cross for my sins. I open the door of my life and receive you as my Savior and Lord.
Thank you for forgiving me of my sins and giving me eternal life. Take control of the throne of my life. Make me the kind of person You want me to be.

Does this prayer express the desire of your heart?
If it does, pray this prayer right now.

page.question: Christ will come into your life as He promised.
